dialogueTree.title: Volition: "Soft, light brown eyes look back at..."
dialogueTree.text: Soft, light brown eyes look back at you, directly into the space behind your eye sockets. You see the smoke rise from between her painted red lips. She's beautiful...

links.title: Volition: "I have bad news for you."
links.text: I have bad news for you.

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Volition: "You know these guys?"
links.text: You know these guys?

links.title: Logic: "Who, me?"
links.text: Who, me?

links.title: Drama: "Yes, you. He's talking about you, y..."
links.text: Yes, you. He's talking about you, you boring stiff.

links.title: Volition: "You too."
links.text: You too.

links.title: Drama: "Me? What did I do? I'm merely a mas..."
links.text: Me? What did I do? I'm merely a master thespian...

links.title: Volition: "These guys are compromised. She's g..."
links.text: These guys are compromised. She's got them singing along to her tune. The little bleeps and bloops you trust for info -- you can't trust them anymore.

links.title: You: "Oh my god."
links.text: Oh my god.

links.title: Volition: "Believe it."
links.text: Believe it.

links.title: You: "Which ones exactly are affected?"
links.text: Which ones exactly are affected?

links.title: Volition: "There's no way of knowing. At the m..."
links.text: There's no way of knowing. At the moment I'm afraid it's best to assume...

links.title: Volition: "...*all* of them."
links.text: ...*all* of them.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Bullshit, man, I ain't *compromised..."
links.text: Bullshit, man, I ain't *compromised*.

links.title: Volition: "*Especially* that guy. That guy's t..."
links.text: *Especially* that guy. That guy's the most compromised one in here.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "No fucking way, man, I just want a..."
links.text: No fucking way, man, I just want a drag of that sweet Menthol ziggie.

links.title: Volition: "Really? Quick, tell me what's under..."
links.text: Really? Quick, tell me what's under her jumpsuit?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "GLORY. TRUTH. SOFTNESS. PROTECT HER..."
links.text: GLORY. TRUTH. SOFTNESS. PROTECT HER. SHE WANTS YOU.

links.title: Volition: "I take it back. He's got it pretty..."
links.text: I take it back. He's got it pretty bad, but this *next guy's* on another level entirely...

links.title: Suggestion: "She likes you. The Crownhead is a b..."
links.text: She likes you. The Crownhead is a boring condom. He's jealous. This is human nature.

links.title: You: "How did this happen?"
links.text: How did this happen?

links.title: Volition: "How it always does -- through subtl..."
links.text: How it always does -- through subtlety.

links.title: You: "What can I do?"
links.text: What can I do?

links.title: Volition: "There's nothing you can do about it..."
links.text: There's nothing you can do about it. You are how you are -- and she is how she is. Things will go as they do.

links.title: You: "Can't you turn them normal again?"
links.text: Can't you turn them normal again?

links.title: Volition: "No."
links.text: No.

links.title: You: "What use is this then?"
links.text: What use is this then?

links.title: Volition: "It's better to know you're being pl..."
links.text: It's better to know you're being played than to be played without knowing it, is it not?

links.title: You: "Does this mean she's been lying to..."
links.text: Does this mean she's been lying to me?

links.title: Volition: "Yes. Mr. Thespian here has been sin..."
links.text: Yes. Mr. Thespian here has been singing paeans to how truthful she is...

links.title: Drama: "She isth a laedy most fair and just..."
links.text: She isth a laedy most fair and juste!

links.title: Volition: "In his defence -- to reduce him to..."
links.text: In his defence -- to reduce him to such inadequacy, she probably had to employ half-truths more often than outright lies.

links.title: Rhetoric: "That is correct. And omissions too."
links.text: That is correct. And omissions too.

links.title: You: "Can I trust that guy?"
links.text: Can I trust that guy?

links.title: Volition: "A little. They're all still of limi..."
links.text: A little. They're all still of limited use, interpreting things to the best of their ability. Maybe they add flair or something? I wouldn't know. I don't add flair.

links.title: Volition: "But when it comes to assessments of..."
links.text: But when it comes to assessments of character and factual accuracy they are not to be trusted. Not with her.

links.title: You: "Can I trust any of them *ever again..."
links.text: Can I trust any of them *ever again?*

links.title: Volition: "Don't be melodramatic. You can trus..."
links.text: Don't be melodramatic. You can trust them. Just not with *her*.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A light green speck, and imperfecti..."
links.text: A light green speck, and imperfection, on the outer rim of her right iris. It sparkles...

links.title: You: "Okay."
links.text: Okay.

links.title: Volition: "Good. The less paranoid option. You..."
links.text: Good. The less paranoid option. You can trust them. Just not with *her*.

links.title: Volition: "I think it's safe to assume: yes. M..."
links.text: I think it's safe to assume: yes. Mr. Thespian here hasn't been speaking up. If he were, I suspect there would be paeans to her truthfulness. Like this...

links.title: Drama: "She isth a laedy most fair and just..."
links.text: She isth a laedy most fair and juste!

links.title: Volition: "...no? He's not going to show up? I..."
links.text: ...no? He's not going to show up? I'm sorry, your lie detection isn't working. It's not her doing, he's just totally inept. It looks like you're also an idiot. But that's not her fault.

links.title: Empathy: "No, not an idiot. You're just more..."
links.text: No, not an idiot. You're just more of a *sensitive* type. Thinks with his *heart*. This woman's *pain* draws you in.

links.title: You: "What is her *plan*?"
links.text: What is her *plan*?

links.title: Volition: "You can't draw a sound conclusion...."
links.text: You can't draw a sound conclusion. The one who usually does says...

links.title: Logic: "She may want to control the informa..."
links.text: She may want to control the information roll-out -- not to become a suspect. She may have a past she's escaping, unrelated to this case. You doubt it's something truly insidious.

links.title: Volition: "See? It's oddly moderate. Probably..."
links.text: See? It's oddly moderate. Probably compromised.

links.title: Half Light: "You are *not* afraid. This is a mer..."
links.text: You are *not* afraid. This is a mere girl, she was someone's child but a decade ago.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "...nothing? Someone else was suppos..."
links.text: ...nothing? Someone else was supposed to chime in, weren't they? And then they didn't -- just me swooshing around in here now. Swoosh!

links.title: Volition: "Huh... no, Mr. Conclusion. You're a..."
links.text: Huh... no, Mr. Conclusion. You're always kind of limited in your analytical abilities. That's not *her* fault. But still...

links.title: You: "I've been talking to myself long en..."
links.text: I've been talking to myself long enough. Let's get back to it.

links.title: Volition: "Don't worry, it's only been four or..."
links.text: Don't worry, it's only been four or five seconds. You've got this.

links.title: You: "(Say it out loud.) "Miss, are you m..."
links.text: (Say it out loud.) "Miss, are you manipulating me?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The silence broken, she exhales a l..."
links.text: The silence broken, she exhales a little cloud of smoke and says...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""God, no!""
links.text: "God, no!"

links.title: You: "(Don't say anything.) Just close yo..."
links.text: (Don't say anything.) Just close your eyes and let the moment pass.

links.title: Volition: "For a second her face disappears fr..."
links.text: For a second her face disappears from your cornea. Only a silvery negative remains.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "Still smiling a tired smile."
links.text: Still smiling a tired smile.

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: You: "I knew something was off..."
links.text: I knew something was off...

links.title: Volition: "I'm sorry I didn't catch it sooner...."
links.text: I'm sorry I didn't catch it sooner. It takes conscious effort on your part.

links.title: Suggestion: "Who, me?"
links.text: Who, me?

links.title: Authority: "Yes, you. He's talking about you, y..."
links.text: Yes, you. He's talking about you, you grovelling sycophant.

links.title: Volition: "You too."
links.text: You too.

links.title: Authority: "Me? Get outta here, I'm solid."
links.text: Me? Get outta here, I'm solid.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Who, me?"
links.text: Who, me?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yes, he's talking about you, you si..."
links.text: Yes, he's talking about you, you sinewy idiot.

links.title: Volition: "You too."
links.text: You too.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Me? What have I done this time?"
links.text: Me? What have I done this time?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Who, me?"
links.text: Who, me?

links.title: Composure: "Yes, he's talking about you, you sh..."
links.text: Yes, he's talking about you, you shifty asshole.

links.title: Volition: "You too."
links.text: You too.

links.title: Composure: "Me? No way, I'm straight, man."
links.text: Me? No way, I'm straight, man.

links.title: Logic: "Who, me?"
links.text: Who, me?

links.title: Drama: "Yes, you. He's talking about you, y..."
links.text: Yes, you. He's talking about you, you boring stiff.

links.title: Volition: "You too."
links.text: You too.

links.title: Drama: "Me? What did I do?"
links.text: Me? What did I do?

dialogueTree.title: Volition: "Just like the last time, light brow..."
dialogueTree.text: Just like the last time, light brown eyes look back at you. All is as it was, you feel cigarette fumes rise from her lips. She's just as beautiful...

links.title: Suggestion: "Don't worry. We will protect you fr..."
links.text: Don't worry. We will protect you from her beauty. We will *consult* you through the reefs and sounds of her persona.

links.title: Drama: "We will see through deceits. You ar..."
links.text: We will see through deceits. You are shielded. You are wise.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You are advised. There are muscles..."
links.text: You are advised. There are muscles on long white bones that line her limbs, just below the silver jumpsuit...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Miss Oranje Disco Dancer... You wan..."
links.text: Miss Oranje Disco Dancer... You want to put your hand on her back and feel it arch.

links.title: You: "What is... happening?"
links.text: What is... happening?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Nothing. Just time passing. Don't w..."
links.text: Nothing. Just time passing. Don't worry.

links.title: Authority: "You are not a *fool*."
links.text: You are not a *fool*.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Anything out of the ordinary and yo..."
links.text: Anything out of the ordinary and you would be notified.

links.title: Endurance: "Air moves in your windpipe. Your he..."
links.text: Air moves in your windpipe. Your heart beats. You're a detective -- get back to detecting.

links.title: You: "Am I being... beguiled?"
links.text: Am I being... beguiled?

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She presses her elbows against her..."
links.text: She presses her elbows against her waist and slowly turns her head.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Her hair brushes her shoulders, mak..."
links.text: Her hair brushes her shoulders, making a small hissing sound, almost imperceptible...

links.title: You: "Avert your eyes."
links.text: Avert your eyes.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The strange moment ends. It was bri..."
links.text: The strange moment ends. It was brief, no longer than 2.2 seconds.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Serious..." She takes a long, hard..."
links.text: "Serious..." She takes a long, hard drag of her cigarette, then stretches her neck.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear cracking in her shoulders."
links.text: You hear cracking in her shoulders.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Let me make this 100% clear then,..."
links.text: "Let me make this 100% clear then, officer. I was not sexually assaulted. Would I be this flippant if I had been?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You get the feeling she's done enou..."
links.text: You get the feeling she's done enough opiates -- and needed enough NACRA -- to still be flippant if her arm were cut off and fed to her.

links.title: You: ""Titus asked you to spice things up..."
links.text: "Titus asked you to spice things up -- for us?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Pretty much." She cradles her coff..."
links.text: "Pretty much." She cradles her coffee cup in both hands.

links.title: Interfacing: "Warming them."
links.text: Warming them.

links.title: Endurance: "She must be very cold. And exhauste..."
links.text: She must be very cold. And exhausted of this life.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Warming up your hands relieves stre..."
links.text: Warming up your hands relieves stress and anxiety, makes you feel and appear calmer, more comfortable. Seems she's doing that here -- consciously or not.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure you weren't raped?""
links.text: "Are you sure you weren't raped?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm 89% sure.""
links.text: "I'm 89% sure."

links.title: You: ""So you're not entirely sure?""
links.text: "So you're not entirely sure?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You know how it is.""
links.text: "You know how it is."

links.title: Half Light: "You *do* know how it is."
links.text: You *do* know how it is.

links.title: You: ""Do I?""
links.text: "Do I?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Hmh..." She flicks a bit of ash aw..."
links.text: "Hmh..." She flicks a bit of ash away. "Maybe you don't..." The ash lands on her jumpsuit. She brushes it off.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "There are numerous cigarette burns..."
links.text: There are numerous cigarette burns on those silvery scales -- easy to see now that you're closer.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""In conclusion, officer -- I'm gonn..."
links.text: "In conclusion, officer -- I'm gonna go with a mild to medium *not raped* here."

links.title: You: ""Okay then.""
links.text: "Okay then."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She takes a long, hard drag of her..."
links.text: She takes a long, hard drag of her cigarette, then stretches her neck.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear cracking in her shoulders."
links.text: You hear cracking in her shoulders.

links.title: You: ""No one deserves to be raped.""
links.text: "No one deserves to be raped."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sure there's *one* person in t..."
links.text: "I'm sure there's *one* person in the world who does." A crooked smile. "I mean, there are *so many* people. But let me make this clear: The man in that tree did not rape me."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The wording -- a verbal eye roll. S..."
links.text: The wording -- a verbal eye roll. She's almost disgusted with the platitude you served up.

links.title: You: ""Sexual assault is a serious matter..."
links.text: "Sexual assault is a serious matter. I need a serious statement from you."

links.title: You: ""It sounds like something happened,..."
links.text: "It sounds like something happened, and you don't want to acknowledge it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Let me make this 100% clear then,..."
links.text: "Let me make this 100% clear then, officer. I was not sexually assaulted." She tilts her head. "Would I be as flippant if I had been?"

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, I don't know what to s..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, I don't know what to say about this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry, miss, but we need a def..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, miss, but we need a definite statement."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Let me make this 100% clear then,..."
links.text: "Let me make this 100% clear then, officers. I was not sexually assaulted. Would I be this flippant if I had been?"

links.title: You: ""Actually I don't.""
links.text: "Actually I don't."

links.title: You: ""I may.""
links.text: "I may."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure you do, you disco animal..."..."
links.text: "Sure you do, you disco animal..." She cuts you down to size with her light brown eyes.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure you do, apocalypse cop..." Sh..."
links.text: "Sure you do, apocalypse cop..." She cuts you down to size with her light brown eyes.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure you do, detective..." She cut..."
links.text: "Sure you do, detective..." She cuts you down to size with her light brown eyes.

links.title: You: ""I do.""
links.text: "I do."

links.title: You: ""How is it then?""
links.text: "How is it then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Hmh..." She flicks a bit of ash aw..."
links.text: "Hmh..." She flicks a bit of ash away. "Maybe you *don't* know." The ash lands on her jumpsuit. She brushes it off.

links.title: Half Light: "You *may* know..."
links.text: You *may* know...

links.title: Half Light: "Do you?"
links.text: Do you?

links.title: You: ""Does that mean you're 11% not sure?""
links.text: "Does that mean you're 11% not sure?"

links.title: You: ""Got it. 89% is good enough. Moving..."
links.text: "Got it. 89% is good enough. Moving on."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Empathy: "She sincerely thinks it's very cool..."
links.text: She sincerely thinks it's very cool of you.

links.title: You: ""What *did* happen between you and..."
links.text: "What *did* happen between you and the victim?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""We partied.""
links.text: "We partied."

links.title: You: ""Wait... *partied*. Where have I he..."
links.text: "Wait... *partied*. Where have I heard that before?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A lot of partying going on.""
links.text: "A lot of partying going on."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "From Titus. About her and Titus' re..."
links.text: From Titus. About her and Titus' relationship -- that's where you heard it.

links.title: You: ""You mean like a birthday party?""
links.text: "You mean like a birthday party?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes." She makes a twisting motion..."
links.text: "Yes." She makes a twisting motion with her hands. "We made balloon animals, drank lemonade, inflated a bouncy castle."

links.title: You: ""Did you rim the lemonade glasses w..."
links.text: "Did you rim the lemonade glasses with sugar? I like to do that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah, I love that too!" Her voice..."
links.text: "Yeah, I love that too!" Her voice is girlishly high-pitched now. "We frosted the glasses, I unwrapped my bike, there was a petting zoo with little white rabbits..."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I would like it to have been that..."
links.text: "I would like it to have been that way. But... it wasn't."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How was it?""
links.text: "How was it?"

links.title: You: ""How was it?""
links.text: "How was it?"

links.title: You: ""You're being sarcastic. That's not..."
links.text: "You're being sarcastic. That's not actually how you partied."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's not, sir. We drank alcohol. A..."
links.text: "It's not, sir. We drank alcohol. A lot of it. We had that effect on each other -- made each other drink harder."

links.title: You: ""What kind of partying?" (Point to..."
links.text: "What kind of partying?" (Point to your bloated face.) "The kind I do?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""With all due respect, sir, I think..."
links.text: "With all due respect, sir, I think we partied a little harder than that."

links.title: You: ""*No one* parties harder than me.""
links.text: "*No one* parties harder than me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Please, you're alive and *fifty*!..."
links.text: "Please, you're alive and *fifty*! I've known people who party so hard they're dead at 14..." She stops to take a short drag.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What no one does *on your level* i..."
links.text: "What no one does *on your level* is hitting the repeat button, I'll give you that. And *maybe* room-trashing."

links.title: You: ""Harder than this?" (Keep pointing..."
links.text: "Harder than this?" (Keep pointing to your face.) "I didn't know it was physically possible."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh, it is." She takes a long drag...."
links.text: "Oh, it is." She takes a long drag. "You're still *alive*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What did you do? When you *partied..."
links.text: "What did you do? When you *partied*?"

links.title: You: ""What did you do? During these part..."
links.text: "What did you do? During these parties."

links.title: You: ""I don't get it. What do you mean *..."
links.text: "I don't get it. What do you mean *partied*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""We drank, sir..." She takes a sip..."
links.text: "We drank, sir..." She takes a sip of her coffee. "A lot. For weeks basically. We had that effect on each other -- we made each other drink harder. That's why I liked him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else?""
links.text: "What else?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Stimulants. Speed also has that ef..."
links.text: "Stimulants. Speed also has that effect -- making you drink harder. And then drinking harder makes you do more speed. It's quite the combination. We also had sex."

links.title: Endurance: "Whoah. After so much drinking *and*..."
links.text: Whoah. After so much drinking *and* drugs -- how did they manage it?

links.title: You: ""Hold on. After so much drinking an..."
links.text: "Hold on. After so much drinking and drugs... *how?*"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""*Untraditionally*, officer." She p..."
links.text: "*Untraditionally*, officer." She puts out her Astra, but lights another one with its end first.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She's cold and strange. I'm not pic..."
links.text: She's cold and strange. I'm not picking anything up here.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Your imagination starts whirring, w..."
links.text: Your imagination starts whirring, whether you want it to or not.

links.title: You: ""You were lovers?""
links.text: "You were lovers?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I guess you can say that, yes. A b..."
links.text: "I guess you can say that, yes. A bit. Lovers is such an emotional word. But there was something there. We did enough drugs for there to be."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How did you two meet?" The lieuten..."
links.text: "How did you two meet?" The lieutenant's voice is quiet, calm.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Downstairs." She taps on the roof..."
links.text: "Downstairs." She taps on the roof with her 10 cm heel. "At the bar. He was on some sort of assignment -- a military man, as you probably know. Had a cool, scary scar."

links.title: Suggestion: "She appears aloof, but that scar pa..."
links.text: She appears aloof, but that scar part... the *scary* is stressed and drawn out. What's that about? Apprehension?

links.title: Empathy: "With longing. She misses him."
links.text: With longing. She misses him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When was this?""
links.text: "When was this?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A month ago? Something like that.""
links.text: "A month ago? Something like that."

links.title: You: ""How long ago was that?""
links.text: "How long ago was that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""About a month? Something like that.""
links.text: "About a month? Something like that."

links.title: You: ""How did you meet?""
links.text: "How did you meet?"

links.title: You: ""Were feelings involved?""
links.text: "Were feelings involved?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A little. The drugs were good enou..."
links.text: "A little. The drugs were good enough -- and we did enough of them."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mhm." She looks down at the yard."
links.text: "Mhm." She looks down at the yard.

links.title: You: ""What else?""
links.text: "What else?"

links.title: You: ""Suspect partied with victim. Write..."
links.text: "Suspect partied with victim. Write it down, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're being sarcastic.""
links.text: "You're being sarcastic."

links.title: You: ""I am. Care to elaborate, miss?""
links.text: "I am. Care to elaborate, miss?"

links.title: You: ""No, I'm literally satisfied with t..."
links.text: "No, I'm literally satisfied with that answer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not." He turns to the woman. "..."
links.text: "I'm not." He turns to the woman. "What was your relationship with the man they hanged?"

links.title: You: ""It must be hard..." (Point to the..."
links.text: "It must be hard..." (Point to the yard.) "Seeing him there."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes," she says bitterly. "I've..."
links.text: "Oh yes," she says bitterly. "I've had a great view. From the roof, out of the bathroom window. In my dreams..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A bitter cringe. It *hurts*. You lo..."
links.text: A bitter cringe. It *hurts*. You look to the lieutenant...

links.title: Composure: "He takes a small step closer."
links.text: He takes a small step closer.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You called us. The RCM...""
links.text: "You called us. The RCM..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Logic: "Jackpot!"
links.text: Jackpot!

links.title: You: ""The call -- reporting the hanging?..."
links.text: "The call -- reporting the hanging? That was you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I made it." She nods. "And I would..."
links.text: "I made it." She nods. "And I would appreciate it if you didn't tell everyone. In Martinaise they call it *snitching*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Reporting crimes is confidential i..."
links.text: "Reporting crimes is confidential in Revachol, miss."

links.title: You: ""Before we go on -- if it's *snitch..."
links.text: "Before we go on -- if it's *snitching* then why do it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because I couldn't *handle* it any..."
links.text: "Because I couldn't *handle* it anymore." She takes a drag -- her voice thick with disgust. "None of these people called. He just kept hanging there. Then they started stripping him..."

links.title: Empathy: "Tearing off his armour, demeaning h..."
links.text: Tearing off his armour, demeaning him, throwing rocks at him...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The voice was disguised," he asks,..."
links.text: "The voice was disguised," he asks, clearly wishing to distract her from the images. "Did you?..."

links.title: You: ""The caller's voice was disguised.""
links.text: "The caller's voice was disguised."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't exactly *disguise* it. I..."
links.text: "I didn't exactly *disguise* it. I just muffled the mic and nicked the landline a little."

links.title: You: ""Nicked it -- how?""
links.text: "Nicked it -- how?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""With nail clippers. And I diverted..."
links.text: "With nail clippers. And I diverted some radio fuzz into it. Into the cold wire."

links.title: Logic: "So *she's* Garte's mystery phone cu..."
links.text: So *she's* Garte's mystery phone cutter!

links.title: You: ""And, in the process, you broke the..."
links.text: "And, in the process, you broke the landline downstairs."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Did I?" She looks into her coffee...."
links.text: "Did I?" She looks into her coffee. "Fuck. I didn't mean to. I had no idea what I was doing."

links.title: Logic: "Jigsaw falling into place. This is..."
links.text: Jigsaw falling into place. This is satisfying. Good catch, I appreciate the symmetry.

links.title: Volition: "You should be wary of what this guy..."
links.text: You should be wary of what this guy likes. He's easily duped by his love of jigsaw puzzles.

links.title: Interfacing: "Still, that's pretty clever tamperi..."
links.text: Still, that's pretty clever tampering. Simple and clever, crossing the lines like that.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which landline?""
links.text: "Which landline?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The one downstairs, officer. I use..."
links.text: "The one downstairs, officer. I used the Whirling landline."

links.title: Interfacing: "That's some clever tampering. Simpl..."
links.text: That's some clever tampering. Simple and clever, crossing the lines like that.

links.title: You: ""Seems like you had *some* idea. Th..."
links.text: "Seems like you had *some* idea. That was nifty."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thanks." She manages a smile."
links.text: "Thanks." She manages a smile.

links.title: Drama: "She looks a bit like a little girl..."
links.text: She looks a bit like a little girl who's just been complimented on her bike repair skills.

links.title: You: "Don't mention it."
links.text: Don't mention it.

links.title: Interfacing: "She must have had training of some..."
links.text: She must have had training of some kind...

links.title: You: ""Why go through all the trouble?""
links.text: "Why go through all the trouble?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know, sir. It was stupid...."
links.text: "I don't know, sir. It was stupid. I was drunk too. I was *probably* afraid the Union was listening in -- locals say they have ears in the wires."

links.title: Drama: "We're not *entirely* convinced abou..."
links.text: We're not *entirely* convinced about that answer, but okay -- let it slide. Pushing won't help here.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for making the call, mis..."
links.text: "Thank you for making the call, miss. It was the right thing to do."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't want to, sir. But if I ha..."
links.text: "I didn't want to, sir. But if I hadn't, he'd *still* be hanging there..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't want to, sir. But if I ha..."
links.text: "I didn't want to, sir. But if I hadn't, he'd *still* be hanging there..." She looks away.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He won't be down there long, miss...."
links.text: "He won't be down there long, miss. We will move the body to the morgue soon."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't want to, sir. And he's *s..."
links.text: "I didn't want to, sir. And he's *still* hanging there..." She looks away.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will move the body to the morgu..."
links.text: "We will move the body to the morgue today, miss. Don't worry."

links.title: You: ""Well, thank you for making the cal..."
links.text: "Well, thank you for making the call anyway."

links.title: You: ""At least you called.""
links.text: "At least you called."

links.title: You: ""A risky move, altogether.""
links.text: "A risky move, altogether."

links.title: Logic: "You were right to suspect there mig..."
links.text: You were right to suspect there might be foul play involved with the broken phone line!

links.title: Logic: "So that's why the phone is out of o..."
links.text: So that's why the phone is out of order. She tampered with the Whirling landline!

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I made the call. And I would appre..."
links.text: "I made the call. And I would appreciate it if you didn't tell everyone. In Martinaise they call it *snitching*."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A bitter cringe. It hurts her."
links.text: A bitter cringe. It hurts her.

links.title: Empathy: "You wonder... is it enough to..."
links.text: You wonder... is it enough to...

links.title: You: ""Did you make the call?""
links.text: "Did you make the call?"

links.title: You: "Don't say it."
links.text: Don't say it.

links.title: Empathy: "She hunches her shoulders a bit, ma..."
links.text: She hunches her shoulders a bit, making herself smaller.

links.title: Empathy: "It hurts her. But does it hurt enou..."
links.text: It hurts her. But does it hurt enough to...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes," she says bitterly. "I hav..."
links.text: "Oh yes," she says bitterly. "I have *multiple* viewpoints. From the roof, out of the bathroom window. In my dreams..."

links.title: You: ""What can you tell me about him. Na..."
links.text: "What can you tell me about him. Name, eyes, age..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry, I can't do it." She puf..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, I can't do it." She puffs on her cigarette. "Not right now. Later maybe. I keep seeing him. Like he is now. I can't talk about his -- I don't know -- *hair...*" Another puff, more nervous.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know it's difficult, miss. We ca..."
links.text: "I know it's difficult, miss. We can return to it later."

links.title: Inland Empire: "She meant she sees him in her dream..."
links.text: She meant she sees him in her dreams.

links.title: You: ""I've also seen him in a dream.""
links.text: "I've also seen him in a dream."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You have? Not like I do, I imagine..."
links.text: "You have? Not like I do, I imagine." She's run out of cigarette -- time to light a new one.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She sees them in each other's arms."
links.text: She sees them in each other's arms.

links.title: You: ""You're in each other's arms.""
links.text: "You're in each other's arms."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes. And then he's dead. His mouth..."
links.text: "Yes. And then he's dead. His mouth agape..." She looks into the light green pack of cigarettes and pulls out another one, preparing to light it.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Agape? Ready to catch a bullet? A c..."
links.text: Agape? Ready to catch a bullet? A coincidence? Make a note and return to it later.

links.title: You: ""How do you see him?""
links.text: "How do you see him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You don't wanna know." She looks i..."
links.text: "You don't wanna know." She looks into the pack -- it's light green -- then pulls out a ciggy.

links.title: You: ""I see him as *me*.""
links.text: "I see him as *me*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She dips the cigarette in the light..."
links.text: She dips the cigarette in the lighter's flame and inhales, then looks at you -- with her lungs full of smoke.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I can see the similarity, yes." Sh..."
links.text: "I can see the similarity, yes." She breathes out, through her nostrils. The air smells of menthol.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Funny," the lieutenant says softly..."
links.text: "Funny," the lieutenant says softly.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Funny how?""
links.text: "Funny how?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing." He nods toward the yard...."
links.text: "Nothing." He nods toward the yard. "I also saw him. We had a long inspection and that sort of thing... sticks with you. Let's move on."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "In my dream, he thinks, he said I'v..."
links.text: In my dream, he thinks, he said I've failed his children... you glance at the lieutenant. Then back to her.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She fishes a cigarette out of her p..."
links.text: She fishes a cigarette out of her pack and lights it -- then looks at you with her lungs full of smoke.

links.title: You: ""Better conclude this part of our t..."
links.text: "Better conclude this part of our talk."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes." The young woman dips her..."
links.text: "Oh yes." The young woman dips her cigarette into the lighter's flame and inhales.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You *pissed* it all away... All of..."
links.text: You *pissed* it all away... All of it. Elysium.

links.title: You: ""What did they hang him for, if not..."
links.text: "What did they hang him for, if not rape?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""He had something to do with the st..."
links.text: "He had something to do with the strike. One has been roiling since I got here. Rotten timing..." She thinks. "But you probably know all about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And his role in this strike was......"
links.text: "And his role in this strike was... what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think he was in a security detai..."
links.text: "I think he was in a security detail. He was ex-military. Worked for Wild Pines -- and against the Union. We didn't discuss work much, if you know what I mean. But I understood it was dangerous."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And they lynched him for it?""
links.text: "And they lynched him for it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods."
links.text: She nods.

links.title: You: ""And his role in this strike was......"
links.text: "And his role in this strike was... what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think he was in a security detai..."
links.text: "I think he was in a security detail. He was ex-military. Worked for Wild Pines; against the Union. We didn't discuss work much, if you know what I mean. But I understood it was dangerous."

links.title: You: ""And you think they lynched him for..."
links.text: "And you think they lynched him for it?"

links.title: You: ""Why was there a bullet in his head?""
links.text: "Why was there a bullet in his head?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Bullet?" There's a silence. Her br..."
links.text: "Bullet?" There's a silence. Her brows meet in the middle, for a pained frown. "They *shot* him too?"

links.title: Drama: "I'm not picking up any theatre-craf..."
links.text: I'm not picking up any theatre-craft here, sir. The pause is sincere.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They stripped his clothes *and* th..."
links.text: "They stripped his clothes *and* they shot him..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean *after* they hanged him?""
links.text: "You mean *after* they hanged him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm confused. Sorry.""
links.text: "I'm confused. Sorry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So am I. Were you aware that he ha..."
links.text: "So am I. Were you aware that he had also been shot, miss?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Things are starting to go a little..."
links.text: "Things are starting to go a little over my head here... I thought he was hanged? I was not *present* when they did it. I don't know what happened. I just know what they told me -- and Sylvie, the bartender."

links.title: Logic: "This is beginning to get *confusing..."
links.text: This is beginning to get *confusing* for you too and we don't like that. Where was she last Sunday night?

links.title: You: ""Where were you when this happened?""
links.text: "Where were you when this happened?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cowering. I was cowering downstair..."
links.text: "Cowering. I was cowering downstairs with Sylvie."

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: Logic: "If we're letting things *be* out of..."
links.text: If we're letting things *be* out of courtesy -- why did you even dig the bullet out in the first place? But fine...

links.title: Logic: "It's hard to know what to think abo..."
links.text: It's hard to know what to think about that answer.

links.title: Empathy: "She's just tired. Don't push her to..."
links.text: She's just tired. Don't push her too much.

links.title: You: ""You mean *after* they hanged him?""
links.text: "You mean *after* they hanged him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm confused. Sorry.""
links.text: "I'm confused. Sorry."

links.title: You: ""Were you aware that he was also sh..."
links.text: "Were you aware that he was also shot, miss? In the mouth?"

links.title: You: ""Again -- how do the Hardie boys kn..."
links.text: "Again -- how do the Hardie boys know you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Like I said, we met over drinks.""
links.text: "Like I said, we met over drinks."

links.title: You: ""Did you *party*?""
links.text: "Did you *party*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A little, yeah.""
links.text: "A little, yeah."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like you partied with the deceased?""
links.text: "Like you partied with the deceased?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No. Not as hard.""
links.text: "No. Not as hard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry to have to ask this, but..."
links.text: "I'm sorry to have to ask this, but have you had a physical relationship with any of the Hardie boys?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I have.""
links.text: "I have."

links.title: You: ""Which one?""
links.text: "Which one?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Which *ones*, sir -- I don't remem..."
links.text: "Which *ones*, sir -- I don't remember precisely. Titus, obviously. But as I said, it's been a long winter."

links.title: Suggestion: "Could that have been part of the re..."
links.text: Could that have been part of the reason they hanged him?

links.title: You: ""Could that be why they lynched him..."
links.text: "Could that be why they lynched him? Jealousy?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I hope not." A pause. "Actually, I..."
links.text: "I hope not." A pause. "Actually, I *know* that's not the reason. I'm careful about that kind of thing. Not crossing the wires, you know. But that's probably where they got the rape idea."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Men like that? I don't know..." An..."
links.text: "Men like that? I don't know..." Another pause. "It's the way their imaginations work. I suspect it's what they'd like to do to me."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She changes balance from one foot t..."
links.text: She changes balance from one foot to another, crossing her legs.

links.title: You: "Don't mention it."
links.text: Don't mention it.

links.title: Suggestion: "Don't be tactful. She doesn't care."
links.text: Don't be tactful. She doesn't care.

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She sips her coffee. Birds circle o..."
links.text: She sips her coffee. Birds circle overhead.

links.title: You: ""Um, how should I put this...""
links.text: "Um, how should I put this..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I slept with any of them? Yes.""
links.text: "Have I slept with any of them? Yes."

links.title: You: ""But have you had sexual relations..."
links.text: "But have you had sexual relations with any of the Hardie boys?"

links.title: You: ""A little? Like you partied with th..."
links.text: "A little? Like you partied with the deceased?"

links.title: Logic: "There *must* be more to it. You sho..."
links.text: There *must* be more to it. You should return to this topic after you've talked about her relationship with the deceased, maybe?

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They're frequent guests. Downstair..."
links.text: "They're frequent guests. Downstairs." She looks at the floor. It's tarred. "They have a booth for Union members. They're probably down there now."

links.title: You: ""And how did you meet?""
links.text: "And how did you meet?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Over drinks. It's been a long, bor..."
links.text: "Over drinks. It's been a long, boring winter."

links.title: You: ""How do the Hardie boys know you?""
links.text: "How do the Hardie boys know you?"

links.title: You: ""Thank you for telling us all of th..."
links.text: "Thank you for telling us all of this, miss." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""How about we, you know, change the..."
links.text: "How about we, you know, change the subject to something more light-hearted now?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She breathes a silvery sigh of reli..."
links.text: She breathes a silvery sigh of relief. And weariness. The air on the roof feels humid.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Should we head back downstairs, of..."
links.text: "Should we head back downstairs, officer?" The lieutenant looks at you. "We may have things to discuss there."

links.title: You: ""I had something else. Before we go..."
links.text: "I had something else. Before we go. A little thing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. Silvery cigarette fumes d..."
links.text: She nods. Silvery cigarette fumes disappear into her mouth...

links.title: You: ""Let's go." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's go." [Leave.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "As he says so you feel the young wo..."
links.text: As he says so you feel the young woman looking at you... and get a *feeling* you can't quite put your finger on. A suspicion?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait a moment..."
links.text: Wait a moment...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I hope I've been... you know... he..."
links.text: "I hope I've been... you know... helpful. All things considered."

links.title: Inland Empire: "As she says so you feel the young w..."
links.text: As she says so you feel the young woman looking at you... and get a *feeling* you can't quite put your finger on. A suspicion?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait a moment..."
links.text: Wait a moment...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry, but we're not quite don..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, but we're not quite done here yet." He turns to you... "We have more questions. Better to be thorough now than have to come back to this later."

links.title: Empathy: "You get the feeling she might be."
links.text: You get the feeling she might be.

dialogueTree.title: Volition: "She looks back, time moves slowly...."
dialogueTree.text: She looks back, time moves slowly. The triangles of her face rearranging into a weary smile...
